author: A_Brickset_user
title: it's ok
review: This is ok. The player is very big, about 4 times the size of a normal mini-figure. When you slam on his head (ouch!) he throws this basket ball, yet it can't get very far or very high. How ever, his feet can be connected to regular lego.

author: DarthVader_
title: An okay set.
review: This was okay, but it was weird!  I like how it can throw a basketball!  I also like how it can stand on a lego board or lego pieces.  It was kinda cool but I don't really like it.  Itleast it was free!

author: hustla187
title: One Armed Player
review: If a minifig had one arm, that better be a big arm. This is sort of odd but interesting. He can throw it with his only arm which is cool and his legs stick to Lego pieces. However, he is way too big and could be smaller. I can only give this a 3.

author: mvila09
title: Weird looking!
review: I was 7 when i got it at McDonalds,which was 4 years ago.Pros free,it can throw the basketball,i still have it,big basket ball.Cons im not even sure if his hair is real!,the sticker comes off easily,weird arm,weird looking.
